@graph.description: As like many making a living online, in the last 12 months we’ve dived deep into AI, and vigorously researched, tested and executed AI strategies in all areas on our businesses. Some have failed, some were underwhelming, and others have performed well. Some very well. What we’ve experienced with using AI, is that there is […]
